attributes.action: restrict vote counting after elections to business hours in the days immediately after an election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the situation where we have tired and emotional politicians being interviewed by tired and emotional journalists - all looking for the appropriate soundbite puts unnatural strain and stress on the returning officers and staff. Reduce this stress by making it a 9-5 job the next day - and every subsequent day thereafter

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/post-manifesto/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
